root.step1: For the simplest of all slime recipes, all you need is cornstarch.
root.step2: Just dump some into a bowl, add some water, & start mixing.
root.step3: Keep adding water until it reaches the consistency you want (a good place to start is 2 parts cornstarch to 1 part water).
root.step4: You can also add food coloring to make it look more legit.
